Introduction

Bang Minah (Korean: 방민아) mononymously known as Minah (Korean: 민아; Japanese: ミナ) is a South Korean singer, songwriter and actress under SM C&C. She rose to fame as the Main Vocalist and Visual of the South Korean pop girl group Girl's Day, formed under DreamT Entertainment.

She debuted in the South Korean pop girl group Girl's Day under DreamT Entertainment as an original member with their debut single "갸우뚱 (Tilt My Head)" on the 7th of July 2010. In 2013, Minah made her film debut in Holly, playing a high school student who aspires to be a ballerina. She eventually made her solo debut on the 15th of March 2015 with her first mini-ablum "I Am A Woman Too".

After leaving DreamT Entertainment in 2019 due to not renewing her contact and signing with Yooborn Company in March 2019, Minah has continued to star in dramas such as "My Absolute Boyfriend" and "Check Out the Event".

In 2024, Minah left Yooborn Company and signed a conract with SM C&C.
